snippet.title: Fire! - Amstrad CPC Longplay.
snippet.description:
See video description for info and time shortcuts.
Savestates were used.

Here are some cool and friendly channels you must see:

http://www.youtube.com/user/VincentGreece
http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ

This is "Fire!" for the Amstrad CPC released back in 1990 by New Deal Productions and developed by Luc Guillaume(code) and Elie Daniel(music).

It's another simple shooter in which you control a helicopter and all you have to do is to fly left or right, engage enemy planes and gun emplacements and destroy the with your rockets.
Keep an eye on your fuel and shields because losing one of these your helicopter will become a ball of fire!

Graphics are nice and colorful and there are two levels of parallax scrolling although not very smooth.
Sound effects are basic and there is no in game music. You still get a short intro and hi-score tune.

The game is very easy to finish.
It has 6 missions in total and after them it loops back to mission 1.

Thank you for watching and feel free to rate and comment.

00:24 Mission 1
02:42 Mission 2
04:26 Mission 3
06:34 Mission 4
08:46 Mission 5
10:50 Mission 6
13:28 Intro music

0110000101101100011001010111100000110111001101100110011101110010
